official_title: Quadratus Lumborum Block to Improve Postoperative Pain Management After Laparoscopic Myomectomies: a Double-blinded and Prospective Randomized Clinical Trial.
inclusion_criteria:
* Presence of uterine fibroids requiring surgical excision with preservation of the uterus
* Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and availability for the duration of the study
* Provision of signed and dated informed consent form
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 45 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pre-existing diagnoses of anxiety or depression
* Pre-existing coagulopathies
* Pre-existing neuropathic or chronic pelvic pain
* Chronic opioid use
* Illiteracy due to inability to read and understand plain questionnaire
* Non-English speaking
* BMI >38
